page.title: 10SHERE SCHOOL
page.content: 4. School Cottage built 1887. Originally intended as a school Masters house for Mr.Coleman but the sub-lease was never granted to the school. 5. The earliest known pupil at Shere School was{Mrs.Mary Fox.}c1873 6. July 1950 Ministry of Health granted "Controlled" status to Shere School. (Thus school buildings are paid for and repaired by State who therefore take over a greater part of the management of the School and appointment of Teachers). 7. Schools various names:- 1870 Girls & Boys Schools (Endowed) 1905 Shere National School. 1915 Shere Public Elementary School. 1950 Shere C.of E.Primary School. 1974 Shere C.of E.First School. From a history of the school by Bevis Colmer 1985.
